item.title: Rob and Michele Reiner's children speak out after Nick Reiner's arrest
item.description: Jake and Romy Reiner, the children of renowned Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele Singer Reiner, are speaking out for the first time.

item.title: WATCH: Oscars reveal 2026 shortlist
item.description: Ahead of nominations in January, The Academy Awards revealed the list of top movies set to be in the running for the 98th Oscars.
